The history of Timon of Athens, the man-hater as it is acted at the Dukes Theatre : made into a play / by Tho. Shadwell. Shadwell, Thomas, 1642?-1692. Shakespeare, William, 1564-1616. Timon of Athens.
[9], 86, [2] p.
Printed by J.M. for Henry Herringman ..., London : 1678.
Shakespeare's play greatly altered. Cf. NUC pre-1956. Reproduction of original in British Library.
=======
